name: European Committee for Umami
membership:
International Glutamate Technical Committee
International Glutamate Information Centre
goal: The ECU is a european non profit scientific organisation dedicated to research on Monosodium Glutamate (MSG) and Umami (the 5th taste) in the doamins of biochemistry, metabolism, physiology, pharmacology and toxicology.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: additives reevalution, nutrient profiles, EFSA transparency initiatives, refit, novel foods
